title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama. Chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers. Same API surface as the Python library.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama models as LLM, chat, and embedding backends.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style). Upload docs, manage models, multi-user, dark mode.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper with chat history, model switching, and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s UI.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store + Streamlit frontend.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: LlamaIndex LLM integration for Ollama; enables retrieval-augmented generation pipelines.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Community n8n node to call Ollama models inside no-code workflows.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama-dbee
summary: DBeaver plugin that adds SQL query generation using local Ollama models.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM SDK for Ollama (Kotlin friendly) with sync/async APIs and model management.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js starter that proxies Ollama REST endpoints with CORS and API-key auth.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that chats using any Ollama model; slash commands & thread support.
